title: Streetwear Casual
prompt: Convert this into a portrait of a man in trendy streetwear with oversized hoodie, ripped jeans, and sneakers. Place him leaning casually against a graffiti wall with natural daylight and a shallow depth-of-field effect for an edgy, Instagram worthy look.
